channel.title: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]
channel.description:
Alright i need some serious help. my server status page is hosted by the account Early. my co-owner forgot the password to early about 3 months ago and i cant edit the server info witch is all old an out dated. i really need to fix this. it sucks even more the email for the account was a fake. so if any staff on moparscape could email me and i could somehow show proof this is my co-owners/my account and i could get it back. would be alot of help need this account back asap
i was thinking you could just take the server of the toplist because i cant post another one up with the same ip. but ive used that server status page for over a year since my 317 so i want it to stay up.

item.title: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Fusion Realm ©, post:7, topic:365912”] open notepad and type in random letters eg. wef980j43jrweq890f0324jvop you might see something you reconize.
hack it, using cheat engine or something, people say its crap but its just usefull in some cases.[/quote]

Are you serious? XD

Read full topic
item.source: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]

item.title: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]
item.dc:creator: @Fusion_Realm Fusion Realm ©
item.description:
@Fusion_Realm wrote:

they are things i do when i forget my passwords… trust me it works.

Read full topic
item.source: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]

item.title: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Fusion Realm ©, post:7, topic:365912”]Well if you want to find you password do this:

make a list of your most favored things eg. cheese, girls, cars, beer ect… to jog your memory.
open notepad and type in random letters eg. wef980j43jrweq890f0324jvop you might see something you reconize.
check “options” in your internet browers then “saved password” it might of been saved.
hack it, using cheat engine or something, people say its crap but its just usefull in some cases.[/quote]…what?

Read full topic
item.source: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]

item.title: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“blakeman8192, post:5, topic:365912”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=462110.msg3380947#msg3380947 date=1288027144]

Maybe you shouldn’t have used a fake email? In my opinion, you were asking for it. Also, it sounds to me like you’re just trying to get your uptime reset. But that could just be me, as I hold the opinion that most humans are not trustworthy in general.

What humans?
[/quote]All.[/quote]
You have humans on Earth?

Read full topic
item.source: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]

item.title: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]
item.dc:creator: @Fusion_Realm Fusion Realm ©
item.description:
@Fusion_Realm wrote:

Well if you want to find you password do this:

make a list of your most favored things eg. cheese, girls, cars, beer ect… to jog your memory.
open notepad and type in random letters eg. wef980j43jrweq890f0324jvop you might see something you reconize.
check “options” in your internet browers then “saved password” it might of been saved.
hack it, using cheat engine or something, people say its crap but its just usefull in some cases.

Read full topic
item.source: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]

item.title: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

How could the email be fake? In order to register the account SMF verifies it is real, and if you change the email, SMF verifies it is real.

Read full topic
item.source: Need serious Help [forgot pass to a very important account]

Maybe you shouldn’t have used a fake email? In my opinion, you were asking for it. Also, it sounds to me like you’re just trying to get your uptime reset. But that could just be me, as I hold the opinion that most humans are not trustworthy in general.
[/quote]
What humans?[/quote]All.
